text: Amethi's 'Pat Rani' is richer than the 'Rani' but Prajapati rules the roost Amethi's 'Pat Rani' is richer than the 'Rani' but Prajapati rules the roost Shailvee Sharda According to the affidavit filed by the two queens, the estimated worth of Garima Sinh is Rs 2.9 crore while Ameeta's net worth is Rs 12.6 crore. Sitting SP MLA Gayatri Prajapati of Samajwadi Party, who is also in the fray is richer than the two with net worth of over Rs 20 crore. | Updated: Feb 22, 2017, 04.13 PM IST File photo of Garima Sinh. LUCKNOW: Elements of competition are inherent in the 'Rani-Pat-Rani' equation. But in Amethi, Vidhan Sabha elections have taken the rivalry to the next level as both wives of Raja Sanjay Sinh contest against each other. Sinh's first wife Rani Garima Sinh is a Bhartiya Janata Party candidate, while his other wife Ameeta Sinh is contesting on an Indian National Party ticket. Financial worth of the two is for all to know. According to the affidavit filed by the two queens, Ameeta has pipped Garima on the financial front. The estimated worth of Garima Sinh is Rs 2.9 crore while Ameeta's net worth is Rs 12.6 crore. Sitting SP MLA and minister in Akhilesh Yadav government Gayatri Prajapati of Samajwadi Party, who is also in the fray is richer than the two with net worth of over Rs 20 crore. Prajapati's current worth has risen almost 10 times in five years. In 2012, his declared immovable assets were worth Rs 1.21 crore and movable assets worth Rs 50.88 lakh. Garima has more gold but Ameeta has more guns. Garima has declared she has over 500 grams gold and a double barrel gun. Ameeta, on the other hand, has a rifle, a pistol, besides a double barrel gun and her gold jewellery weighs 258 grams. Garima rides a Maruti 800, whereas Ameeta moves in SUV and XUVs.
